ARABIC: ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then after that Allah will turn to anyone He wills. Allah is Ever-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet God may turn (even) after this to whomsoever He please, for God is compassionate and kind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then (after so chastising the unbelievers), Allah enables, whomsoever He wills, to repent. Allah is All-Forgiving, All-Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: After that occasion God forgave those whom He wanted. God is All-knowing and All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then afterwards Allah will give repentance to whomever He wills; and Allah is Oft Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then after that Allah will accept the repentance of whom He wills. And Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then will Allah after this turn (mercifully) to whom He pleases, and Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then God thereafter turns towards whom He will; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then afterward Allah will relent toward whom He will; for Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then after that, God will turn in His mercy to whom He wills: God is forgiving and merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then Allah will, thereafter, relent toward whomsoever He liketh, and Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then Allah shall turn clemently after that to whomever He wishes. Indeed Allah is all-forgiving, all-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Again will Allah, after this, turn (in mercy) to whom He will: for Allah is Oft-forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then after that Allah will accept the repentance of whom He will. And Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yet thereafter, Allah turns to whom He will. He is the Forgiving, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, after that, God will relent towards whomever He wills. God is Forgiving and Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then Allah will accept repentance after that for whom He wills; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [9:27] Then afterwards God will relent to whom He will, from among them, by [their acceptance of] Islam. And God is Forgiving, Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then afterward) after fighting and the defeat (Allah will relent towards whom He will) towards those who repent amongst them; (for Allah is Forgiving, Merciful) towards him who repents.
